Invalid input. Please enter valid values.

Warm-up: 10 minutes of jogging
Strength Training:
- Squats: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Bench Press: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Deadlift: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Pull-Ups: 3 sets of 8 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of jumping rope
Cardio:
- Running: 30 minutes
Core:
- Plank: 3 sets of 1 minute
- Russian Twists: 3 sets of 20 reps
- Bicycle Crunches: 3 sets of 20 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of yoga
Rest or Light Activity (e.g., walking, yoga)

Warm-up: 10 minutes of dynamic stretches
Strength Training:
- Overhead Press: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Bent Over Rows: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Leg Press: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Dips: 3 sets of 10 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of biking
HIIT:
- 20 seconds sprint, 40 seconds rest x 10
Core:
- Leg Raises: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Mountain Climbers: 3 sets of 20 reps
- Side Plank: 3 sets of 30 seconds each side
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of brisk walking
Strength Training:
- Lunges: 3 sets of 10 reps each leg
- Incline Bench Press: 3 sets of 10 reps
- Romanian Deadlift: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Lat Pulldown: 3 sets of 12 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of rowing machine
Cardio:
- Swimming: 30 minutes
Core:
- Plank: 3 sets of 1 minute
- Leg Raises: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Oblique Crunches: 3 sets of 15 reps each side
Cool-down: 10 minutes of yoga
Rest or Light Activity (e.g., walking, yoga)

Warm-up: 10 minutes of elliptical
Strength Training:
- Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Seated Rows: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Leg Extensions: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Tricep Pushdowns: 3 sets of 12 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of light jogging
HIIT:
- 30 seconds high knees, 30 seconds rest x 10
Core:
- Sit-Ups: 3 sets of 20 reps
- Russian Twists: 3 sets of 20 reps
- Reverse Crunches: 3 sets of 15 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of light walking
Strength Training:
- Bodyweight Squats: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Chest Press: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Leg Curls: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Assisted Pull-Ups: 3 sets of 10 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of stationary bike
Cardio:
- Brisk Walking: 30 minutes
Core:
- Standing Oblique Crunches: 3 sets of 15 reps each side
- Seated Leg Lifts: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Standing Side Bends: 3 sets of 20 reps each side
Cool-down: 10 minutes of yoga
Rest or Light Activity (e.g., walking, yoga)

Warm-up: 10 minutes of easy cycling
Strength Training:
- Dumbbell Bicep Curls: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Dumbbell Rows: 3 sets of 12 reps
- Leg Press: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Overhead Tricep Extensions: 3 sets of 12 reps
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching

Warm-up: 10 minutes of gentle jogging
Low-Impact HIIT:
- 30 seconds march in place, 30 seconds rest x 10
Core:
- Pelvic Tilts: 3 sets of 15 reps
- Seated Torso Twists: 3 sets of 20 reps
- Bird Dogs: 3 sets of 10 reps each side
Cool-down: 10 minutes of stretching
Outdoor Activity (e.g., gardening, walking in nature)
